name: Panamax
description: Medium-sized vessel capable of passing through the original Panama Canal locks

name: Post-Panamax
description: Large vessel exceeding Panamax dimensions, used in major global routes

name: Handymax
description: Versatile mid-size cargo vessel suitable for smaller ports

name: Feedermax
description: Small regional vessel optimized for feeder and coastal operations

name: ULCV
description: Ultra Large Container Vessel used for high-capacity intercontinental shipping
